name: Human
description: Adaptable and ambitious, Humans excel in no single discipline but are masters of balance. Their innate versatility makes them ideal for any calling.

name: Elf
description: Ancient and graceful, Elves carry centuries of arcane knowledge in their blood. Swift and perceptive, they commune with magic as naturally as breathing.

name: Orc
description: Born in the crucible of war, Orcs are raw power incarnate. Their mighty frames absorb punishment that would shatter lesser beings â€” for glory, they endure.

name: Dwarf
description: Stout and unyielding, Dwarves are forged from the mountains themselves. Their resilience in battle is matched only by their stubborn refusal to die.
